response.original_title: 素人ギャルを心霊スポットに誘い出しリアルな化け物に襲わせる
response.overview: This is the best way to cool down in the hot summer. We lure the amateur gals out to a dark, dark place in the middle of the night for a psychic experience tour. Although they are a little scared and timid, they are more interested in seeing scary things, and they follow us excitedly. Then, the realistic monster appears and attacks and penetrates the crying, cowardly gal. This is a realistic video for those who like erotic horror. The girl who is made to ascend to heaven while crying is super excited!
response.title: Luring Amateur Gals to Haunted Spot and having them attacked by real Monsters
